column2: As the economic and sociopolitical situations change in $COUNTRY$, we should review the funding provided to the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Space Agency, and adjust it accordingly. Spending too much during economic downturns can bring unrest.
Reclaim the Churchill Rocket Research Range

Located 23 kilometers outside of Churchill, Manitoba, the Churchill Rocket Research Range was developed to launch sub-orbital flights to study the upper atmosphere. While most of its facilities have been left abandoned and in disrepair since the early 70s, we could repurpose the remaining facilities and equipment.
